Chapter 5 Summary In Summary, this book teaches us the very basi tools need to get started on our very first data abnalyst project up until Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA). dplyr allows us to do data manipulation . ggplot2 allows us to draw elegant data visualisation. Bringing these 2 tools together let us perform EDA. Although there are a vast variety of other tools available that help us to solves various other tasks, we wount be covering them in this book.
